mapper.select: SELECT CCD_DTL AS INSP_CD, CCD_DTL_NM AS INSP_NM, CCD_DTL_DESCT AS INSP_SD FROM CCDS_DTL WHERE CCD = 'PQC' ORDER BY CCD
SELECT p.EDCTS_LOT_NO, o.ORDER_NO, o.VEND_NM, o.EDCTS_CD, o.PRDT_NM, o.ORDER_CNT, o.PAPRD_DT FROM PRDT_INSP p, ORDER_SHEET o WHERE p.EDCTS_CD = o.EDCTS_CD AND o.PROG_APPE = '생산완료'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRDT_INSP (EDCTS_LOT_NO, ORDER_NO, EDCTS_CD, INSP_PSCH, INSP_DT, INSP_CNT, INSP_JM) VALUES (#{edctsLotNo}, #{orderNo}, #{edctsCd}, #{inspPsch}, #{inspDt}, #{inspCnt}, #{inspJm})
INSERT INTO PRDT_INSP_DTL (EDCTS_LOT_NO, INSP_CD, INSP_NM, INSP_SD, INSP_RSLT_DTL, INSP_JM_DTL) VALUES (#{edctsLotNo}, #{inspCd}, #{inspNm}, #{inspSd}, #{inspRsltDtl}, #{inspJmDtl})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM PRDT_INSP WHERE 1=1 and EDCTS_LOT_NO LIKE '%'||#{edctsLotNo}||'%' and INSP_DT <= #{wrhousCd}||'%' and INSP_DT >= #{wrhousCd}||'%' ORDER BY EDCTS_LOT_NO
